analyzed: dpal ldan ye shes rdo rje 'dzin dang bde ba che //

original: mgo phyed khrag bkang nyams dgu'i gar gyis rol par bzhugs //
analyzed: mgo phyed khrag bkang nyams dgu'i gar gyis rol par bzhugs //

original: me tog 'dab dbus ge sar rang gi snying po bzhin //
analyzed: me tog 'dab dbus ge sar rang gi snying po bzhin //

original: blo ldan cho ga bzang shes pas //
analyzed: blo ldan cho ga bzang shes pas //

original: bde chen dngos grub nye ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bde chen dngos grub nye ba'i phyir //

original: ka p'a la 'dra'i gnas su ni //
analyzed: ka p'a la 'dra'i gnas su ni //

original: ka p'a la yi dngos grub bsgrub //
analyzed: ka p'a la yi dngos grub bsgrub //

original: mtshan bzang rin chen mgo phyed la //
analyzed: mtshan bzang rin chen mgo phyed la //

analyzed: ga bur gla rtsi tsandan sogs //

original: sna tshogs dri zhim byugs byas te //
analyzed: sna tshogs dri zhim byugs byas te //

analyzed: lnga mtshan lnga phrag lnga rab dgang //
